changelog.55: Added Quiz Master - Millionaire-style trivia game with AI-generated questions
changelog.71: Added 'Give Up' button to Word Search that reveals all words
changelog.86: Added favorite games - tap the heart to pin games to the top
changelog.88: Removed 'returning to home' message after feedback submission
changelog.74: Removed visible scrollbars in the app
changelog.84: Name prompt now appears when starting a game without a saved name
changelog.85: Leaderboard now shows all players instead of top 10
changelog.77: Language selection changed to native dropdown
changelog.60: Games now show sparkle (new) and dizzy star (updated) badges
changelog.79: Feedback popup now only appears after one week of use
changelog.76: Feedback page now auto-redirects to home after submission
changelog.73: New SvelteKit app with modern UI, i18n, PWA install banner, and weekly feedback popup
changelog.66: Games now auto-sorted by most recent activity
changelog.17: Added Strikkespil - rotate yarn tiles to connect all loose ends
changelog.63: Redesigned Sænke Slagskibe as newspaper-style logic puzzle
changelog.65: Fixed missing OPDATERET badge on Ordleg
changelog.61: Made game badges dynamic (auto-calculated from dates)
changelog.48: Added Labyrint - maze game with fog of war
